sent.orig: Praise the LORD, O my soul; all my inmost being, praise his holy name.
sent.trans: 我的心哪，你要称颂耶和华，凡在我里面的，也要称颂耶和华的圣名！

sent.orig: Praise him, all his angels, praise him, all his heavenly hosts.
sent.trans: 2他的众使者都要赞美他。他的诸军都要赞美他。

sent.orig: Praise God in the great congregation; praise the LORD in the assembly of Israel.
sent.trans: 26从以色列源头而来的、当在各会中称颂主神。

sent.orig: Guan Zhong world do not praise the talents and praise Baoshu understand.
sent.trans: 天下的人不赞美管仲的才干，而赞美鲍叔能了解人。

sent.orig: We come before Him praise and worship for he is worthy to be praise!
sent.trans: 我们一起来到神面前赞美祂，因为祂是配得我们的赞美！
